mapper.select:
select
from tbl_sp_supplier where supplier_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND delete_flag = 1

SELECT t.id, t.operator, t.operated, t.operation_type, t.operation_notes, t.merchant_code, t.contract_no, t.type FROM tbl_merchant_operation_log t WHERE t.merchant_code = #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t.operated desc

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_merchant_operation_log t WHERE t.merchant_code = #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.type='1'

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_merchant_operation_log t WHERE t.merchant_code = #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.operation_type=#{operationType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.id, t.operator, t.operated, t.operation_type, t.operation_notes, t.merchant_code, t.contract_no, t.type FROM tbl_merchant_operation_log t WHERE t.contract_no = #{contractNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.type = '0' ORDER BY t.operated desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_merchant_operation_log ( id, operator, operated, operation_type, operation_notes, merchant_code, contract_no, type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{operator}, #{operated}, #{operationType}, #{operationNotes}, #{merchantCode}, #{contractNo}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_merchant_operation_log t WHERE t.merchant_code = #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
